meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be remembered.
meanings.sent1: Her rememberabilities made her the star of the class reunion.
meanings.sent2: The book's rememberabilities ensured it became a classic.
meanings.sent3: His forgetfulness was no match for his friend's impressive rememberabilities.
meanings.sent4: The town's history museum showcased the rememberabilities of its past.
meanings.sent5: The old photographs captured the rememberabilities of a bygone era.

meanings.definition: The ability to recall or bring to mind past events or experiences.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's rememberabilities allowed her to share fascinating stories from her youth.
meanings.sent2: Studying improves your rememberabilities during exams.
meanings.sent3: The detective's exceptional rememberabilities helped solve the mystery in no time.
meanings.sent4: Music has the magical power to trigger forgotten rememberabilities.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies brought back childhood rememberabilities.
